html: A 1997 court settlement called Flores v. Reno prevents the gov’t from keeping children with their parents if the parents are charged with a crime for crossing the border illegally. The law doesn't have to be enforced this way due to prosecutorial discretion.
text: A 1997 court settlement called Flores v. Reno prevents the gov’t from keeping children with their parents if the parents are charged with a crime for crossing the border illegally. The law doesn't have to be enforced this way due to prosecutorial discretion.

html: I opposed today’s #NetNeutrality CRA because the light-touch regulatory structure that allowed the internet to thrive for over 2 decades has worked fine. html: I'm pleased that Kyle Duncan has been confirmed to the Circuit Court, but disappointed that most Democrats opposed him. Their objection sounded a lot like a religious test (again). Someone who defends the right to live out your faith should not be controversial.
text: I'm pleased that Kyle Duncan has been confirmed to the Circuit Court, but disappointed that most Democrats opposed him. Their objection sounded a lot like a religious test (again). Someone who defends the right to live out your faith should not be controversial.

html: I’m pleased the Senate has invoked cloture on the nomination of Jim Bridenstine to be NASA Administrator. Final vote is expected tomorrow. Jim will serve our nation well in this role, just as he did as a Navy pilot & a U.S. Representative specializing in satellite innovation.
text: I’m pleased the Senate has invoked cloture on the nomination of Jim Bridenstine to be NASA Administrator. Final vote is expected tomorrow. Jim will serve our nation well in this role, just as he did as a Navy pilot & a U.S. Representative specializing in satellite innovation.

html: As a man married to an amazing woman and a dad of two daughters, I am stunned that the Women’s March thinks that women’s rights are about sex workers. html: As we consider this #Omnibus, remember: o Fiscal Year ended Sept. 30, 2017, nearly 6 months ago! o We’ve passed 5 Continuing Resolutions o National debt is $21 trillion o 2018 deficit could top $1 trillion o This bill is $1.3 trillion & 2,300 pages This is no way to govern...
text:
As we consider this #Omnibus, remember:

o Fiscal Year ended Sept. 30, 2017, nearly 6 months ago! 
o We’ve passed 5 Continuing Resolutions
o National debt is $21 trillion
o 2018 deficit could top $1 trillion
o This bill is $1.3 trillion & 2,300 pages

This is no way to govern...

html: The 2010 #DoddFrank law has really hurt small banks in my state. By 2014, more than 40% of the banks in #Oklahoma no longer did mortgage lending at all. That means less opportunity for rural families, farmers, and small businesses. My state needs #Relief4MainStreet.pic.twitter.com/kXX5Qy6lob

html: Steel & aluminum are imported & used by many US manufacturers, including in my state of Oklahoma. It’s important that we acknowledge the significance these imports have on providing thousands of good-paying jobs in the US when deliberating the merits of enacting trade barriers.

html: Border Security (aka "The Wall") Facts: ✓ There is NO PLAN to build a 2,500 mile concrete wall along entire southern border ✓ There are places where fencing (The Wall) is the best security. In other places, drones, surveillance & increased border agents are more effective (3/3)
text:
Border Security (aka "The Wall") Facts:
✓ There is NO PLAN to build a 2,500 mile concrete wall along entire southern border
✓ There are places where fencing (The Wall) is the best security. In other places, drones, surveillance & increased border agents are more effective (3/3)

html: Border Security (aka “The Wall”) Facts: ✓ We already have 650 miles of border fencing (The Wall) RIGHT NOW ✓ Border fencing (The Wall) has increased considerably over the last 10-15 years, with the support of Dems & Republicans (2/3)
text:
Border Security (aka “The Wall”) Facts:

html: Border Security (aka “The Wall”) Facts: ✓ Border security is something that both Dems & Republicans have agreed is important for national security ✓ Democrats (including Sens. Clinton, Obama, & Schumer) have voted to build hundreds of miles of border fencing (The Wall) (1/3)
text:
